get.description: Get all namespaces.<br>Other detail info: <ul><li><i>Action code</i>: 11303</li><li><i>Returns</i>: list of namespaces</li></ul>

parameters.description: only retrieves active namespaces
parameters.name: activeOnly

post.description: Create a namespace.<br>By default the namespace is enabled.<br>In multi tenant mode, parentNamespace will be automatically filled with requester namespace if the requester is using studio or publisher token, and it will be filled with studio namespace if the requester uses game token. An oauth client will also be created and the id will be returned. <br>displayName rule: <br/><ul><li>Alphanumeric lowercase and uppercase are allowed</li><li>Allowed Special Character: ',. -</li><li>Must start and end with alphanumeric</li><li>Spaces and special character are allowed but cannot appear twice in a row</li></ul><br/>Other detail info: <ul><li><i>Action code</i>: 11301</li><li><i>Returns</i>: created namespace</li></ul>

errorCodeerrorMessage
20002validation error
20019unable to parse request body
11338Unable to {action}: Namespace contains invalid character(s)
11339Unable to {action}: Display name contains invalid character(s)
11340Unable to {action}: The maximum number of games namespace for studio:{studio} has been exceeded

x-errorCodes.11338: Unable to {action}: Namespace contains invalid character(s)
x-errorCodes.11339: Unable to {action}: Display name contains invalid character(s)
x-errorCodes.11340: Unable to {action}: The maximum number of games namespace for studio:{studio} has been exceeded

put.description: Update my profile.<br>Updates user profile in the target namespace (namespace in the path). If token's namespace doesn't match the target namespace, the service automatically maps the token's user ID into the user ID in the target namespace. post.description: Generate an upload URL for user content. It's valid for 10 minutes.<br/>There are two types of storage limits per user: maximum file count and maximum total file size.<br/>These limits vary depending on the upload category used.<br/><br/><b>1. Default category:</b><br/>- Maximum file count per user: 10 files<br/>- Maximum total file size per user: 100MB<br/><b>2. Reporting category:</b><br/>- Maximum file count per user: 3 files every 1 hour<br/>- Maximum total file size per user: 30MB every 1 hour<br/><br/><br/>Other detail info: <ul><li><i>Action code</i>: 11102</li><li><i>Returns</i>: URL data</li></ul>

namespace.description: namespace, only accept alphabet and numeric. Will be converted to lowercase

parentNamespace.description: parentNamespace is only present in multi tenant mode

publisher.description: inform whether the specified namespace is publisher namespace or not
